# 1:6 cohort
```{r}
#train_X=train_X%>%filter(total_ab>0)
#result = expand.grid(
 #  ntree=c(1000,2000),
#  sampsize = c(round(n*0.6), round(n*0.8), round(n*0.9)),
 #  nodesize = c( 5,50),
 # mtry=1:round(sqrt(ncol(train_X)-1)),
 # valid_auc = NA)
n=nrow(train_X)                
set.seed(1024)
#for (i in 1:nrow(result)) {
  
  rf.model <- randomForest(formula = case ~ ., data = train_X, 
                           replace = TRUE,
                           ntree =  3000,
                           sampsize = round(n*0.7),
                           nodesize = 25 ,
                           mtry = sqrt(ncol(train_X)-1)
                          )
  print(rf.model)
 # saveRDS(rf.model,here::here("output","model_RandomForest.rds"))

```

## variables of importance
```{r}
importance(rf.model)
varImpPlot(rf.model)

```

# C-statistic
## train
```{r}
set.seed(1024)
pred.y <- predict(rf.model, train_X, type = 'prob')[,2]
  roc_valid <- roc(train_X$case ~ pred.y)
  
  plot(roc_valid)
  print(roc_valid)

```

## valid
```{r}
set.seed(1024)
rm(pred.y)
pred.y <- predict(rf.model, valid_X, type = 'prob')[,2]
roc_valid <- roc(valid_X$case ~ pred.y)
  
plot(roc_valid)
print(roc_valid)

```

# unmatched cohort
```{r}
rm(train_X)
train_X <- read_rds(here::here("output","train_X.rds"))
valid_X <- read_rds(here::here("output","valid_X.rds"))
train_X=train_X%>% distinct(patient_id,patient_index_date, .keep_all=T)
valid_X=valid_X%>% distinct(patient_id,patient_index_date, .keep_all=T)
```


```{r}
col=c("case","total_ab","ab_types","exposure_period" , "broad_prop" ,"interval_med" , "length_mean")
train_X=train_X%>% select(col)
valid_X=valid_X%>% select(col)
train_X$case=as.factor(train_X$case)
valid_X$case=as.factor(valid_X$case)

n=nrow(train_X)                
set.seed(1024)
#for (i in 1:nrow(result)) {
  
  rf.model <- randomForest(formula = as.factor(case) ~ ., data = train_X, 
                           replace = TRUE,
                           ntree =  3000,
                           sampsize = round(n*0.7),
                           nodesize = 25 ,
                           mtry = sqrt(ncol(train_X)-1)
                          )
  print(rf.model)
 # saveRDS(rf.model,here::here("output","model_RandomForest.rds"))

```

## variables of importance

varImpPlot(rf.model)
